OpenPySCAD
==========

Python library to generate OpenSCAD source code. This library provides intuitive interface when you handle 3D data.


Install
-------
You can install OpenPySCAD from PyPI.

.. code-block:: bash

    $ pip install openpyscad


Sample
------

3D Shape
~~~~~~~~
Source:
.. code-block:: python

    Cube([10, 10, 10])


Generated code:
.. code-block::

    cube([10, 10, 10])
